title: 113. Scuttler Network
content:
The tunnels you’ve been walking through have seemed much rounder and rougher than most Estian construction, but you don’t put the clues together until you step into a larger junction of tunnels and the dry, musty scent of spindlescuttlers fills your nose. You must be in an underground network of tunnels they bored through the rock, and based on the gouges left on the tunnel walls by their mandibles, these spindlescuttlers are big.

If you traveled here from Terminal Artery, go to 156.2.

Otherwise, go to 156.1.
